item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Israel tells troops to prepare for possible ground offensive in Lebanon
2. Caroline Ellison gets 2-year prison sentence for FTX fraud
3. European diplomats lobby UK over plans to charge VAT on private education
4. FBI probes whether Silicon Valley venture firm passed secrets to China
5. ‘Can of Ham’ sale tests demand for City of London skyscrapers
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
